feature1.explanation: Both texts use hyphens, colons, and parentheses, showing similarity in punctuation style.

feature2.explanation: Both texts exhibit lexical variation with unique word choices and grammatical features, indicating some similarity in writing style.

feature3.explanation: Both texts show coherence and cohesion in their sentence structures, but differ in content and length, impacting the similarity in writing style.

feature4.explanation: While both texts have distinct narrative styles, the second text's automated nature contrasts with the first text's more informal tone, reducing the likelihood of the same author.

feature5.explanation: No spelling or typographical errors were found in either text, indicating consistency in this aspect.

overall.explanation: Considering the combined assessment of the 5 features, the likelihood of the two texts being written by the same author is moderate.
